title: Zelda Peterson: The Guiding Light
summary: Zelda Peterson discovers her unique ability to see into the future, guiding her community through a tough week with her newfound powers.
summaryGerman: Zelda Peterson entdeckt ihre einzigartige Fähigkeit, in die Zukunft zu sehen, und leitet ihre Gemeinschaft mit ihren neu entdeckten Kräften durch eine schwierige Woche.
summaryDutch: Zelda Peterson ontdekt haar unieke vermogen om in de toekomst te kijken, en gidst haar gemeenschap door een zware week met haar nieuwgevonden krachten.
summaryFrench: Zelda Peterson découvre son capacité unique à voir dans l'avenir, guidant sa communauté à travers une semaine difficile avec ses nouveaux pouvoirs.

story.text: Zelda Peterson starts her week feeling energetic as she coaches her local youth volleyball team. During practice, she experiences a sudden vision of an accident at the nearby crosswalk.
Heeding her vision, Zelda rushes to the crosswalk during her lunchtime, where she manages to prevent a serious accident involving a young cyclist and a speeding car.
The news of her heroic act spreads, and while she feels happy to have helped, she is also a bit overwhelmed by the attention.
Trying to understand her new abilities, Zelda spends a quiet day researching and comes across a mysterious old book about 'Seers' in the local library.
Empowered by her discoveries, Zelda uses her ability to guide a lost hiker safely out of the forest through telepathic guidance.
As word of her deeds continues to spread, people begin seeking her guidance for personal decisions, making her day extremely busy and fulfilling.
Reflecting on the week, Zelda feels content knowing she can make a difference and vows to use her powers to help others.

ending: With a heart filled with purpose, Zelda Peterson stands as a beacon of hope in her community, ready to guide those in need.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility; use your talents to guide and uplift others.
